Room.Name: Center of Main Courtyard
Room.ShortDescription: You are at the base of the monument to King Lyanden and Prince Ragnar.
Room.LongDescription: The bronze statues above you depict the battle where King Lyanden was felled in his defense of the city of Oceancrest. It shows Prince Ragnar kneeling with the head of his father cradeled in his hands, as the king lies mortally wounded. You see that the king is handing Ragnar his Sceptre of Power as he is dying, symbolizing the passing of power from the old king to the new one. Surrounding the figures are several clerics and mages, each pledging their loyalty to the Prince.
